General.Name: Plaza S.A
General.Description: Plaza S.A. develops, builds, administers, manages, exploits, leases, and sublets premises and spaces in shopping centers. The company operates shopping centers. The company operates its shopping centers under the Mall Plaza, Autoplaza, and Motorplaza brands. The company was founded in 1990 and is based in Santiago, Chile. Plaza SA is a subsidiary of Desarrollos Inmobiliarios S.A.
General.Address: Avenida Américo Vespucio No. 1737, Santiago de Chile, Chile

1.Name: Mr. Pablo  Cortés De Solminihac
